name: Terraforming Earth - Alpha Demo
description:
One year ago Andras Csibi had a comfy job at a big company, daydreaming about doing something useful. Creating a game that makes people feel smart seemed like a worthwhile goal, so he counted his savings, realized he wouldn't starve for a year, and jumped into making Terraforming Earth. 

His vision and early prototypes convinced his friends at Noppa Design to drop some actual customers and take up the project's art direction. Csaba Kalman and Loci Alvegi filled Andras's dry and technical world with beautiful landscapes and quirky characters. 

Untainted by industry expertise, we are here to surprise you with something new and memorable.

Early Access: Summer 2019

The game is under heavy development, this is is an Alpha Demo. There are already many more obstacles in the game than the demo shows you. For the Early Access release in June we plan to add more puzzles, more mission types, more environments, and of course the story will unfold and you'll find out where did all the humans go.
